name_validation: Name must be at least 3 letters long and can only contain letters and spaces.
lastname_validation: Last name must be at least 3 letters long and can only contain letters and spaces.
id_validation: ID must be at least 6 digits long and can only contain numbers.
location_validation: Location must be at least 3 characters long and can contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas and periods.
username_validation: Username must be at least 3 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores (_) and hyphens (-).
password_validation: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
phone_validation: Phone number must have at least 10 digits and must only contain numbers.
email_validation: Please enter a valid email address.
platform_select_pay: Your platform to select tickets and pay
turifadigital_desc: TuRifaDigital is the perfect tool to participate in raffles easily. Our platform allows you to select your favorite tickets and make payments quickly and securely.
choose_numbers: Choose your preferred numbers easily and intuitively.
pay_confidence: Make your payments with total confidence and protection.
ticket_example: Scanned ticket is invalid, please check the ticket again
ticket_example_notice: This ticket is just an example. No actual data was received from the server.
title: Title not available
80_percent: When 80% is completed, our raffle plays
when_raffle_plays_desc: The raffle date will be announced once 80% of the tickets are sold
official_link: üîó Official link to follow the raffle:
no_active_raffles: No active raffles, nor recent winners
comprobante_titular: Payment title (Payment title phone, if it is Pago Movil)
no_account_found: No account found for this user. Please check the entered username.
invalid_password: The password entered is incorrect. Please try again.
database_error: There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.
please_wait: Please wait while the operation is completed...
premio_required: Prize name and description are required
texto_ejemplo_desc: If you buy 10 tickets, you automatically participate in the $100 raffle when 30% of the numbers are sold. The day will be announced publicly.
terms_conditions_desc: By registering, you agree to the

conten.contenido: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of TurifaDigi, administered by Yorsi Cruz. The platform operates online, and its official web address is turifadigital.org. Additionally, any relevant communications will also be made through a selector within the site.

TurifaDigi is a platform dedicated to the sale and management of tickets. Upon completing a purchase, the user will receive a confirmation notification for their purchased ticket via the contact methods provided.

We accept payments via bank transfer, Pago M√≥vil, or any other additional method listed on the platform. We reserve the right to modify or add payment methods without prior notice. The ticket price does not include additional taxes.
We want to be clear: returns, refunds, or cancellations are not permitted once a purchase has been processed. All sales are final, and TurifaDigi is not responsible for these actions.
The personal information we collect is handled with strict privacy and security, stored in our database to ensure its confidentiality and protection.

TurifaDigi is committed to resolving any technical failures or inconveniences that directly affect the functionality of the service on our platform. However, we will not be held responsible for improper use of the platform or errors beyond our direct control that do not impede the main functionality of the purchased service.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updates will be notified directly on the platform via a visible "selector" and through the official URL (turifadigital.org). We recommend reviewing these terms periodically.
These terms are governed by the laws of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela. Any dispute arising in connection with these terms shall be resolved exclusively in the competent courts of Venezuela.

Permitted Use: Individual and legitimate purchase of tickets for the user's personal use.
Prohibited Use:
Sending multiple ticket requests simultaneously while Browse or scrolling through the platform is not permitted.
Concurrent access or use from multiple devices for the same account is not recommended. Suspicious activities involving the use of multiple devices for a single account may result in service suspension.

TurifaDigi, including its design, content, and functionalities, is the exclusive property of Yorsi Cruz. The base template used is an adaptation from Zecfa. All rights to the content and materials present on our platform belong to me.

As a user, you have a non-exclusive and limited right to use the platform for ticket purchases, provided you handle your account and platform usage with care and caution, and comply with all these Terms and Conditions.
